description: All global configuration settings for the Deployment.

default_versions.description: Mapping of <module name>: <version> to use as default when no version is specified in a `module load` command`. If no default is specified, deploy-tools will use natsort to place e.g. 1.2 after all alpha, beta and rc candidates as described here: https://natsort.readthedocs.io/en/7.1.1/examples.html#sorting-more-expressive-versioning-schemes

title: DeploymentSettings
